geometry e rarahaneng: Boithuto ba meaho ea jiometri le meaho e hlahang, kapa e hlalosoang ke lipalo tse rarahaneng
lipalo tse rarahaneng: Linomoro tsa sebopeho a + bi moo a le b e leng linomoro tsa sebele
karolo ea sebele: Lereo le nomorong e rarahaneng e se nang yuniti e inahaneloang joalo ka lebaka
karolo e nahanang: Karolo ea nomoro e rarahaneng e nang le yuniti e inahaneloang joalo ka ntlha
mefuta e mengata e rarahaneng: Libaka tsa geometry tse rarahaneng tseo e leng kakaretso ea li-curve le bokaholimo
mefuta e rarahaneng ea algebra: Libaka tsa geometry tse rarahaneng tseo e leng tharollo ea lipalo tsa polynomial
mehaho ea holomorphic: Mehaho ka geometry e rarahaneng e rarahaneng-e fapaneng
lenaneo le fokolang la mohlala: Lenaneo la geometry e rarahaneng bakeng sa ho arola mefuta e mengata e rarahaneng le mefuta e rarahaneng ea algebraic
libaka tsa moduli: Libaka ka har'a jiometri e rarahaneng e behang mofuta o itseng oa ntho ea geometri
monahano oa calabi: Khopolo-taba ea jiometry e rarahaneng e netefalitsoeng ke Shing-Tung Yau mabapi le boteng ba mofuta o ikhethileng oa metric ho mefuta e mengata e rarahaneng.
ngollano hitchin-kobayashi: Ngollano ho jiometry e rarahaneng lipakeng tsa mekotla e tsitsitseng ea holomorphic vector le tharollo ea equation e itseng.
mangolo a nonabelian hodge: Ngollano ka geometry e rarahaneng lipakeng tsa mefuta e meng ea mefuta e mengata e rarahaneng le mefuta e itseng ea meaho ea algebra
hantler-einstein metrics: Mefuta e khethehileng ea metrics ho manifold e rarahaneng e khotsofatsang boemo bo itseng
